thread.title: Bhale Manchi Roju ready for album launch
thread.title_full: Bhale Manchi Roju ready for album launch - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Bhale Manchi Roju ready for album launch
text: It is a known fact that Sudheer Babu is shooting for his upcoming film Bhale Manchi Roju. As per the latest reports, the shooting has been wrapped up recently and the makers are planning to unveil the audio in the last week of this month. The exact date is yet to be confirmed. Young composer Sunny MR has scored the music for the film. Directed by debutante Sriram Aditya, this movie has Vamika Gabbi as the heroine. Sudheer Babu's close friends Vijay Kumar Reddy and Shashi are the producers for the film. Currently, the pre-production work is underway and the makers are planning to release the film in mid November.
